ItemType.name: B1 mining lance
ItemType.attributes: cabbageCorp, energyWeapon, majorItem, minerGear, miningEquipment
ItemType.description: This mining lance uses an array of capacitors to achieve a high fire-rate. It is designed for use in small-scale asteroid mining operations.

ItemType.name: B2 mining lance
ItemType.attributes: cabbageCorp, energyWeapon, majorItem, minerGear, miningEquipment
ItemType.description: This mining lance uses an array of capacitors to achieve a high fire-rate. It is designed for use in standard asteroid mining operations.

ItemType.name: B5 mining lance
ItemType.attributes: cabbageCorp, energyWeapon, majorItem, minerGear, miningEquipment
ItemType.description: This mining lance uses an array of enhanced capacitors to maintain a continuous laser. It is designed for use in large-scale asteroid mining operations.

ItemType.name: B9 mining lance
ItemType.attributes: cabbageCorp, energyWeapon, majorItem, minerGear, miningEquipment
ItemType.description: This mining lance uses an array of advanced capacitors to maintain a continuous high-energy particle beam. It is designed for use in small-scale corporate asteroid mining operations.

ItemType.name: B20 mining lance
ItemType.attributes: cabbageCorp, energyWeapon, majorItem, minerGear, miningEquipment
ItemType.description: This mining lance uses an array of advanced capacitors to maintain a continuous high-energy particle beam. It is designed for use in standard corporate asteroid mining operations.

ItemType.name: B60 mining lance

ItemType.description: This mining lance uses an array of experimental capacitors to maintain a continuous ion beam. It is designed for use in small-scale military asteroid mining operations.

ItemType.name: omnidirectional B450 mining lance
ItemType.attributes: alien, cabbageCorp, cabbageNotStandard, energyWeapon, majorItem, minerGear, miningEquipment
ItemType.description: This alien omnidirectional mining lance appears to use an array of high-powered capacitors to maintain a continuous positron beam. It seems designed for use in large-scale asteroid mining operations and is mounted on an automated turret.

ItemType.name: omnidirectional B800 mining lance
ItemType.attributes: alien, cabbageCorp, cabbageNotStandard, energyWeapon, majorItem, minerGear, miningEquipment
ItemType.description: This alien omnidirectional mining lance appears to use an array of high-powered capacitors to maintain a continuous positron beam. It seems designed for use in small-scale orbital planet mining operations and is mounted on an automated turret.

ItemType.name: omnidirectional B1500 mining lance
ItemType.attributes: alien, cabbageCorp, cabbageNotStandard, energyWeapon, majorItem, minerGear, miningEquipment
ItemType.description: This alien mining lance appears to use an array of high-powered capacitors to maintain a continuous positron beam. It seems designed for use in large-scale orbital planet mining operations and is mounted on an automated turret.

ItemType.name: scanning B1 mining lance
ItemType.attributes: cabbageCorp, cabbageNotStandard, energyWeapon, majorItem, minerGear, miningEquipment, specialty
ItemType.description: This mining lance uses an array of capacitors to achieve a high fire-rate. It is designed for use in small-scale asteroid mining operations. This model includes an asteroid scanner that can detect ore within 3 light-seconds.

ItemType.name: scanning B2 mining lance
ItemType.attributes: cabbageCorp, cabbageNotStandard, energyWeapon, majorItem, minerGear, miningEquipment, specialty
ItemType.description: This mining lance uses an array of capacitors to achieve a high fire-rate. It is designed for use in standard asteroid mining operations. This model includes an asteroid scanner that can detect ore within 4 light-seconds.

ItemType.name: side-mounted B1 mining lance
ItemType.attributes: auxMountDevice, cabbageCorp, cabbageNotStandard, energyWeapon, majorItem, minerGear, miningEquipment
ItemType.description: This mining lance has been modified for external mounting. Its fire controls are linked to a ship's primary weapon. It is designed for use in small-scale asteroid mining operations.

TranscendenceModule.Globals: (setq CCAsteroidScanner (lambda (gRange) (if (and (eq gSource gPlayerShip) ;continues if this event is being run from the playership, if the item is installed and if it is also active (itmIsInstalled gItem) (objIsDeviceEnabled gsource gItem) ) (block (gAsteroids) (switch (eq gRange 1) (setq gAsteroids ;variable that contains the list of viable asteroids defined in the following lines (filter (sysFindObject gSource "t +asteroid; N:1;") ;list to be filtered (stations that are asteroids and within specified range) asteroid ;arbitrary placeholder in the following function for each item from the previously defined list (gr (count (objGetItems asteroid "t +Ore;")) 0) ;function to filter the list (asteroids that still contain ore) ) ) (eq gRange 2) ;I can't directly pass the range value into the criteria, so I make it check for each range up to 50 light-seconds (setq gAsteroids ;I had to use the same workaround for the refinery devices (filter (sysFindObject gSource "t +asteroid; N:2;") ;If there is some specific format for "N:gRange;" that works, I ain't found it yet. asteroid (gr (count (objGetItems asteroid "t +Ore;")) 0) ) ) (eq gRange 3) (setq gAsteroids (filter (sysFindObject gSource "t +asteroid; N:3;") asteroid (gr (count (objGetItems asteroid "t +Ore;")) 0))) (eq gRange 4) (setq gAsteroids (filter (sysFindObject gSource "t +asteroid; N:4;") asteroid (gr (count (objGetItems asteroid "t +Ore;")) 0))) (eq gRange 5) (setq gAsteroids (filter (sysFindObject gSource "t +asteroid; N:5;") asteroid (gr (count (objGetItems asteroid "t +Ore;")) 0))) (eq gRange 6) (setq gAsteroids (filter (sysFindObject gSource "t +asteroid; N:6;") asteroid (gr (count (objGetItems asteroid "t +Ore;")) 0))) (eq gRange 7) (setq gAsteroids (filter (sysFindObject gSource "t +asteroid;
